column1: The Purple Pig////You gotta love pig...I really enjoyed everything about The Purple Pig. The food was fantastic
column3: I ordered the Milk Braised Pork Shoulder with Mashed Potatoes it was phenomenal fork tender pork and the mashed potatoes were so silky amazing
column4: Charred Cauliflower side dish. All the dishes were tasty and each dish had a great combination of flavors. The dessert was just amazing...And I thought the price was very reasonable for the quality of the food and location. If you are a Girl&The Goat fan
column5: you will love The Purple Pig they have very similar concept. Both Amazing! 100% recommend!
